actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that individuals who marry each other during the taxable year may elect to file income tax returns for that taxable year based on their marital status at the beginning of such year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to enable individuals who married during the taxable year to elect to file income tax returns based on their marital status at the beginning of that year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that individuals who marry each other during the taxable year may elect to file income tax returns for that taxable year based on their marital status at the beginning of such year.
